snippet.title: Manipulus - A Deck Building Odyssey Trailer
snippet.description:
Manipulus is a thrilling deck-building, choose-your-own-adventure game with rogue-like mechanics and perma-death. Trapped by mysterious forces, you are made to relive your past, guiding a band of survivors through perilous times.

As a Manipuli general, form strategic defensive lines and manoeuvre your followers to protect and lead your band to safety. Re-play your cards, re-live your actions, and fight to keep your refugees alive in this dark and captivating adventure.

It's time to FORM THE MANIPULUS!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3058960/Manipulus__A_Deck_Building_Odyssey/?beta=1
